name: Stumped
description:
A calming, interactive short story about a boy and a tree who steals his frisbee. 

This game is part of the No Moss Studios Patreon Collections. For $2, patrons get access to 2 new games a month! Follow us on our journey here:
https://www.patreon.com/NoMossStudios

Instructions
Left click to interact
Esc to quit

*Disclaimer: this is not a tree dating sim
